mapper.select:
select
from dictionary where dictionary_type = #{dictionaryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dictionary_sort

select
from dictionary where dictionary_type = #{dictionaryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dictionary_father = #{dictionaryFather,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dictionary_sort

select
from dictionary left join dictionary_type on dictionary_type = type_id where type_Edit = 1
